headline.main: Obama Adds Alabama Civil Rights Area to Park Service
headline.print_headline: Obama Adds Alabama Civil Rights Area to Park Service

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama signed an order Thursday designating an historic civil rights district in Alabama as a national monument, placing several blocks of a city once rocked by racial violence on par with landmarks including the Grand Canyon.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama signed an order Thursday designating an historic civil rights district in Alabama as a national monument, placing several blocks of a city once rocked by racial violence on par with landmarks including the Grand Canyon....

headline.main: Obama Says Israeli Settlements Making Two-State Solution Impossible
headline.print_headline: Obama Says Israeli Settlements Making Two-State Solution Impossible

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama, in an interview aired on Israeli television on Tuesday, said Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's policy backing settlements in occupied territory is making a future Palestinian state impossible.
docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama, in an interview aired on Israeli television on Tuesday, said Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's policy backing settlements in occupied territory is making a future Palestinian state impossible....

headline.main: Obama Administration Ends Special Immigration Policy for Cubans
headline.print_headline: Obama Administration Ends Special Immigration Policy for Cubans

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration on Thursday repealed a measure granting automatic residency to virtually every Cuban who arrived in the United States, whether or not they had visas, ending a longstanding exception to U.S. immigration policy.
docs.snippet: The Obama administration on Thursday repealed a measure granting automatic residency to virtually every Cuban who arrived in the United States, whether or not they had visas, ending a longstanding exception to U.S. immigration policy....

headline.main: Trump Pressures Obama Over U.N. Resolution on Israeli Settlements
headline.print_headline: President-Elect Moves to Shape Mideast Policy

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and SOMINI SENGUPTA
byline.contributor: Peter Baker reported from Jerusalem, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations. Maggie Haberman contributed reporting from New York, Mark Landler from Washington, and Nour Youssef from Cairo.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s forceful insertion into the matter reflected an unusual public split between incoming and outgoing presidents and underscored the stark shift on Middle East policy ahead.
docs.snippet: Mr. Trump’s forceful insertion into the matter reflected an unusual public split between incoming and outgoing presidents and underscored the stark shift on Middle East policy ahead....

headline.main: 'Yes We Did' _ Obama Bids Farewell in Nostalgic Last Speech
headline.print_headline: 'Yes We Did' _ Obama Bids Farewell in Nostalgic Last Speech

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama has bid farewell to the nation in an emotional speech that sought to comfort a country on edge over rapid economic changes, persistent security threats and the election of Donald Trump.

docs.abstract: Editorial applauds Pres Obama's decision to ban oil and gas drilling in nearly all United States waters in Arctic and in string of deepwater canyons in Atlantic; calls move an environmental gift unlikely to harm fortunes of oil industry; questions whether Pres-elect Donald Trump will reverse such measures.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama’s decision to block drilling has been a boon to efforts to protect fragile environments.
